comment: Take this class if you get a chance. Chris is one of the motivating and down to earth people you will ever meet. He truly cares about the students and helping them achieving their personal growth and business goals. This is truly a life changing class and it is not too much work. A MUST TAKE FOR THE COLES COLLEGE EXPERIENCE!!!!
great professor, very motivational. my only complaint is if you ask him a question he just beats around the bush and will not give you an answer.

One word- WOW. This class changed my life. Chris is so passionate about having his students reach new limits and discovering their potential. The work involved will definitely accelerate you into creating the life you want to live. His lectures are inspiring and pushes us to be the best we can be! Love this class, TAKE HIM BEFORE YOU GRADUATE!

The absolute best professor that I have ever taken at KSU. Hands down. I have never met a man who cares so much about his students. If you take his class seriously, it will be a total game changer for your career and- dare I say it -your life!

STOP here! You found him: One of the best professors in the nation. Chris is made from pure awesome sauce. You will leave this class in deep thought every day! You cannot go to this class and not be engaged. He won't let it happen. No tests, but that doesn't mean it's easy. Show up, be engaged, and have fun! Do this and it may change your life.

I had the pleasure of taking his last class taught (on 4122: Venture Analysis) and it was a blast. The lectures were fun but also insightful. He constantly was bringing in guest speakers to broaden our understanding of entrepreneurship. Great professor if you have the opportunity to take him.

BEST PROFESSOR AND CLASS I HAVE EVER HAD!! Hanks is hilarious and will inspire & empower you. His lectures will challenge your mindset and push you out of your comfort zone. 8 total assignments + 1 semester project (starting a business) & NO final. Would pay for this class again in a heartbeat!
